properties.title: Properties
properties.selectOperation: Select an operation to view properties

tooltips.toolDiameter: Diameter of the cutting tool. Must match the physical tool in your CNC machine.
tooltips.passes: Number of offset passes to create the desired isolation gap width.
tooltips.stepOver: Percentage of tool diameter to overlap between passes. Higher values = more overlap = slower but safer.
tooltips.combineOffsets: Merge all offset passes into single geometry. Reduces G-code complexity but loses individual pass control.
tooltips.cutDepth: Depth below the copper surface the tool will cut. Negative values cut into material.
tooltips.travelZ: Height above the board where the tool travels between cuts. Must clear all board features.
tooltips.safeZ: Maximum safe height for rapid moves and tool changes. Should clear all fixtures.
tooltips.depthPerPass: Incremental depth of each pass when using multi-depth cutting. Smaller = gentler on tool.
tooltips.multiDepth: Enable multiple passes at different depths for deep cuts. Reduces tool stress.
tooltips.feedRate: Speed at which the tool moves while cutting (mm/min or in/min).
tooltips.plungeRate: Speed at which the tool descends into material (mm/min or in/min). Usually slower than feed rate.
tooltips.spindleSpeed: Rotation speed of the spindle (RPM). Higher speeds for smaller tools.
tooltips.direction: Climb milling: tool rotation matches feed direction (better finish). Conventional: opposite direction (more stable).
tooltips.entryType: How the tool enters the material. Plunge: straight down. Ramp: diagonal. Helix: spiral down.
tooltips.cannedCycle: Pre-programmed drill cycle. G83 (peck drilling) retracts periodically to clear chips.
tooltips.peckDepth: Depth to drill before retracting when using peck drilling. Smaller = more retracts = cleaner holes.
tooltips.dwellTime: Pause duration at bottom of hole (seconds). Allows chips to clear and reduces burrs.
tooltips.retractHeight: Height to retract to between holes. Should clear board but minimize travel time.

messages.noOperations: No operations loaded. Add PCB files to begin.
messages.enableFusionFirst: Enable fusion first to use this feature
